summary:
Stellantis North America, once known as Chrysler, is a major American car company. It's part of a bigger global company called Stellantis. They make and sell cars under brands like Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, and Ram.

The company started in 1925 when Walter Chrysler bought the Maxwell Motor Company. Over time, they grew by buying other brands and expanding worldwide. However, they faced challenges, almost going bankrupt in the late 1970s but were saved with government help.

In recent years, they merged with other companies, becoming part of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles and then Stellantis. Today, they continue to sell vehicles globally.
title: Chrysler
